about-us.about-us: Welcome! We are the Crypto Genius Squad. We started with ambassadorship and node deployment in projects such as Rizon, BitSong, Gitopia, Desmos, KiChain, Nym, Masa, Medibloc, and others. This experience helped us evolve into professionals in the cryptocurrency and blockchain sphere. We are ready to actively participate in ambassadorial projects and contribute to their development.
